attributes.action: Dental Technology should be a profession to be recognized
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not enough citizens know that dental technicians exsist let alone what we do.  We are professionals, you can say we are the back bone for dentist and vice versa.  We need to be recognized  and considered as a profession not a trade.  There is not enough interest in this skilled professional career. Therefore, there is not enough interest in educating future dental technicians. We are a part of the medical science world, and will always be.
